About Me

who I am

My name is Chris Munoko and I am a senior student at the University of Wisconsin River Falls majoring in Computer Science. I was born and raised in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and currently lives in River Falls(WI).

What I value...

  • Family
  • Faith
  • Professionalism

×

I value...

Family

I would not be the person I am if it was not for my family. They are the first people to support me in everything I do.

Faith

I owe to God everything that I have in my life. Therefore, I value my faith a lot because I do not who I would have been without it.

Professionalism

I always do the work that I am assigned to with great professionalism no matter the circumstances because I know I signed up for it. I am never afraid to ask for help when I do not know something because that is an effective way to learn and to foster(*) communication.

×

I am all about...

Dedication

This has to be one of my strongest assets. I have often heard my coworkers say, "you are not paid enough to work this hard"

Hard work

I have learned from my models who are my father and the soccer player Cristiano Ronaldo that talent is not enough. Hard work is necessary to achieve greatness, so I give 110% in everything I do.

Tenacity

There are times when things get difficult especially in the Computer Science field. Therefore, to achieve my goals, I always go with the motto "fall down 7 times, get up 8"

×

I enjoy...

Coding

I have always been fascinated by how computers work and what we can with them to impact today's society. That is why I chose Computer Science as my major. Although it can get frustrating at times, passion and curiosity continue to motivate me. I enjoy coding in Javascript and Java. I have used HTML, CSS and JavaScript to design a couple of websites for fun including this portfolio. I am now familiar with databases such as MongoDB and Oracle SQL thanks to the Database Management class I took in College.

Soccer

Soccer has always been one of my favorite hobbies. With my busy student schedule, it is difficult to watch it as much as I would like to. However, I usually find time during the weekends to watch a couple of games.

Video Games

I have always enjoyed playing video games. I still play it once in a while but not as much as I used to due to time constraint.

×

eSIS

As a student at UWRF, I am always lost trying to find things on eSIS(electronic Student Information System). The system itself is alright, but it probably needs an improvement. For our capstone project, my team and I are rebuilding the student management student and adding a couple of features to it.

Languages we are using for this project:

  • Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Back-end: Oracle SQL, Java
